SELECT dep.id, dep.name, dep.namespace, derd.message, dep.creation_date, de.cluster_id FROM devops_env_pod dep JOIN devops_env_resource der ON der.instance_id = dep.instance_id JOIN devops_env_resource_detail derd ON der.resource_detail_id = derd.id JOIN devops_env de ON de.id = der.env_id WHERE der.instance_id = #{instanceId} AND der.env_id = #{envId} AND der.kind = 'Pod' AND dep.name = der.name AND de.type = 'user'
